item.description: The ECK Worship Service is Open to all faiths.  Reminding ourselves of the simple truth found in our everyday lives and sharing how we cultivate the awareness of our spiritual relationships is the focus of the Service.  The stories people share preceeded by a brief contemplative period is the essence of our time together.  It is a time inspired by the practical purpose of Life Itself...our essential Spiritual service in all aspects of the life we live.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be signs as you come into the Holiday Inn entrance
item.name: Worship Service - Living a Life of Spiritual Grace
